description: google doesn't let me login, it says the browser is insecure. Thanks for making the effort to port Notion though.

When trying to login, lotion opened my default browser but there was no call back to lotion. I ended up being logged in on my browser but not on the actual electron app.
Aside from this, the feeling of the web view was nice.
There is no app, but only a reference to use the web app -_-
summary: It's only a link for using notion web

description: You cannot login in the app, because when clicking on the Login page, it redirect you to login in your default browser, and does not callback Lotion afterwards. So you end up logged in your default browser only.
Je n'ai pas pu évaluer l'application, elle ne démarre même pas sur ma machine. Je suis donc passé à Notion-Snap.
